sentences.en: Contaminants found in poultry will also be found in their eggs.
sentences.cn: 家禽身上发现的污染物，在禽蛋里也会有。

sentences.en: Dr Binger keeps poultry, pigs and goats.
sentences.cn: 班热博士饲养家禽、猪和羊。

sentences.en: Eat plenty of fish and poultry.
Freshly dead poultry can be rendered into fertilizer or other products.
sentences.cn: 新死的家畜可以炼制成肥料或其它产品.

sentences.en: I've read all the available literature on poultry - farming.
sentences.cn: 我把现有的家禽饲养方面的资料全都读过了.

sentences.en: Many old poultry buildings, hatcheries, and feed mills can be redesignes.
sentences.cn: 许多老的禽舍, 孵化室和饲料磨坊可以重新设计.

sentences.en: Most poultry farmers have to rely on commercially manufactured feeds.
sentences.cn: 多数饲养家禽的农场主不得不依赖商业化生产的饲料。

sentences.en: Packing plants for poultry and dairy prouducts have grown in number.
sentences.cn: 家禽肉类和牛奶产品的包装工厂增多了.

sentences.en: Rye is not a common feed grain for poultry.
sentences.cn: 黑麦不是家禽所吃的常用谷物饲料.

sentences.en: The menu features roast meats and poultry.
sentences.cn: 菜单上的特色菜是烤肉和家禽肉。

sentences.en: Their poultry are kept in the yard.
sentences.cn: 他们的家禽关在院子里.

sentences.en: There is not much poultry in the shops.
They're raising more pigs and poultry than they did last year.
sentences.cn: 他们现在饲养的生猪和家禽比去年多.

sentences.en: This spice is used particularly in poultry feed to deepen the colour of egg yolks.
sentences.cn: 这种香料尤用于家禽的饲料中，以加深蛋黄的颜色。

sentences.en: What do you feed the poultry on?
sentences.cn: 你们用什么饲料喂养家禽?

trans.tran_en: birds such as chickens and ducks that are kept on farms in order to produce eggs and meat
